headline: Sociedad Quimica's Earnings and Revenues Miss Estimates in Q3
summary: SQM sees volume growth in almost all of its business lines amid headwinds from weaker year-over-year pricing in Q3.

headline: PPG Partners SARO/Siccardi, Boosts Powder Coatings Presence in Italy
summary: Access to PPG warehouses, laboratories and manufacturing facilities in Italy will enhance SARO/Siccardi's customer service and response times.
